name: Final Embrace Horror

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 15, Int 3; naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack; Ability Focus (constrict); Final Embrace; base attack bonus +6.

sections.text: A creature that takes damage from your constrict attack is also shaken until the start of your next turn.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your constricting attack has become stronger and more lethal.
